phrs.translation: 人体免疫缺损病毒（即艾滋病毒HIV）
获得性免疫缺陷综合症；爱滋病

sentences.sentence: Of these cases, 214 (59%) were related to anatomical problems, 132 (36%) were related to immunodeficiencies, and 17 (5%) were related to parameningeal infections.
sentences.translation: 在这些病例中，214例（59%）与解剖结构异常相关，132例（36%）有免疫缺陷，17例（5%）有脑膜外相关感染。
